org.apache.james.imap.main
Class ChannelImapResponseWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.james.api.imap.AbstractLogEnabled
      org.apache.james.imap.main.ChannelImapResponseWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImapConstants, ImapResponseWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
OutputStreamImapResponseWriter
public class ChannelImapResponseWriter
extends AbstractLogEnabled
implements ImapConstants, ImapResponseWriter

Class providing methods to send response messages from the server to the client.

upperCaseAscii

public void upperCaseAscii(java.lang.String message)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: ImapResponseWriter
Writes given message converted to upper case. The message may be assumed to be ASCII encoded. Conversion of characters MUST NOT be performed according to the current locale but as per ASCII.

Specified by:
upperCaseAscii in interface ImapResponseWriter
Parameters:
message - ASCII encoded, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

quoteUpperCaseAscii

public void quoteUpperCaseAscii(java.lang.String message)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: ImapResponseWriter
Writes given message converted to upper case. The message may be assumed to be ASCII encoded. Conversion of characters MUST NOT be performed according to the current locale but as per ASCII. The message is surrounded by quotes.

Specified by:
quoteUpperCaseAscii in interface ImapResponseWriter
Parameters:
message - ASCII encoded, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException
